/-- A σ-compact Hausdorff topological manifold over a finite dimensional real vector space is
metrizable. -/
theorem manifold_with_corners.metrizable_space {E : Type _} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace (exprℝ) E]
    [FiniteDimensional (exprℝ) E] {H : Type _} [TopologicalSpace H] (I : model_with_corners (exprℝ) E H) (M : Type _)
    [TopologicalSpace M] [ChartedSpace H M] [SigmaCompactSpace M] [T2Space M] : metrizable_space M :=
  by
  haveI := I.locally_compact; haveI := ChartedSpace.locallyCompact H M
  haveI : NormalSpace M := normal_of_paracompact_t2
  haveI := I.second_countable_topology
  haveI := ChartedSpace.secondCountable_of_sigma_compact H M
  exact metrizable_space_of_t3_second_countable M
#align manifold_with_corners.metrizable_space manifold_with_corners.metrizable_space
